document.full_text: the diplomatic encounter was intended both to cajole the pakistanis and to reassure them of political support at a time when congress has threatened to cut aid.
document.title: in tense post-bin laden trip to pakistan, clinton seeks firm action on extremists
lines_and_colors: the diplomatic encounter was intended both to cajole the pakistanis and to reassure them of political support at a time when congress has threatened to cut aid.
